text: Sano ŵaŵalongolele ni kuŵa ŵandanda (mu Usilamu) mwa Akusama (ŵaŵasamile ku Maaka), ni Akukamuchisya (ŵali alukosyo ŵa m’Madina), kwisa soni aŵala ŵaŵaakuyiye ŵanganyao mwa umbone, Allah tachanonyela (pakwapochela masengo gao gambone), nombe nao tachinonyelwa Najo (pa malipilo gatachaalipila), soni ŵalinganyichisye ŵanganyao Matimbe ga ku Mbepo gasikujilima pasi pakwe sulo. Chakaŵe ŵandamo mwalakwemo kwa yaka ni yaka. Kwalakweko ni kupunda kwekulungwa nnope
